amendment.description: Amendment requires the Justice Department to develop and implement a program to ensure that aliens who have entered the U.S. illegally more than 3 times are deported to locations more than 500 miles away from the U.S. border.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the Justice Department to develop and implement a program to ensure that aliens who have entered the country illegally more than 3 times are deported to locations more than 500 miles away from the U.S. border.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
